title: o7 Help
description:
Thank you for taking the time to use my bot. I am always open to suggestions for this bot on my development discord: <https://discord.gg/PfruVg4>

If you would like to invite this bot to your own discord, please use this link: <https://discord.com/oauth2/authorize?client_id=753820564665270333&scope=bot&permissions=268954688>

fields.name: Blueprints
fields.value:
Get information about what it will take to manufacture items.

**bp** _<name>_ - _(<#/#/#>: optional skill levels basic / advanced / expert)_

fields.name: Market Prices
fields.value:
Retrieves market data based on provided search terms.

_Special Thanks to_ <https://www.reddit.com/user/eve-echoes-market/> for creating <https://eve-echoes-market.com> where this bot queries for market data.

**pricecheck** _<item name>_
_aliases_: **market** / **mp** / **pc** / **price**/ **value**

fields.name: Applications
fields.value:
Will ask the user questions that have been configured by the server admins and post the users answers in a specified channel.

_Admin Configuration_
**appconfig**

_Start User Application_
**apply** 
_aliases:_ **app**  / **application**

fields.name: Set Roles
fields.value:
A helper to allow a server admin to quickly set a users role.

**setrole** _<@user>_ _<@role>_
**setrole**  _<@role>_ _<@user>_
